Welcome to Professional Clinical Programming

Welcome to the Johnson & Johnson Python Academy, designed specifically for clinical programming professionals. This comprehensive program transforms traditional programming training into healthcare-focused, practical skills development.

Program Scope

  • Target Audience: 300+ clinical programming staff (J&J and vendors)
  • Global Reach: Online/remote delivery to worldwide locations
  • Focus: Python fundamentals leading to PySpark mastery
  • Platform: Databricks for hands-on clinical data processing

Why Python + PySpark for Clinical Programming?

  • Scale: Process large clinical trial datasets efficiently
  • Standards: Industry-standard tools for pharmaceutical programming
  • Integration: Seamless connection with existing J&J infrastructure
  • Compliance: Enterprise security for sensitive clinical data

Program Structure

Module Focus Duration Sessions
1. System Setup Professional development environment 1 hour 9
2. Core Python Python fundamentals for clinical data 2 hours 15
3. PySpark Distributed computing for clinical data 1.5 hours 14
4. Git/Bitbucket Version control for clinical projects 1 hour 8
5. Databricks Cloud analytics platform 1.5 hours 8
6. Advanced Professional data pipelines 1 hour 8

What You'll Find in Databricks:

  • Interactive notebooks for each session
  • Sample clinical datasets for practice
  • Progressive exercises building real-world skills
  • Collaborative workspace for team learning

Professional Development Approach

  • Modular Delivery: Complete modules independently
  • Pilot Cohorts: Small groups test new modules before general release
  • Recorded Sessions: Short-duration topics for flexible learning
  • Practical Focus: Every exercise uses realistic clinical scenarios
  • Assessment: Module quizzes ensure comprehension
  • Support: DU-SME led technical sessions for continued learning

Success Criteria

By program completion, you will:

  • Utilize PySpark for clinical data manipulation within Databricks
  • Process large-scale clinical datasets efficiently
  • Implement professional data pipelines for clinical workflows
  • Apply version control best practices for collaborative programming
  • Meet J&J compliance requirements for clinical programming
